title: Salman Khan’s Sikandar teaser delayed in respect of Manmohan Singh’s demise - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Postponed Due to Manmohan Singh's Demise

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

In a mark of respect to the late former Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh, the makers of Salman Khan’s film Sikandar have postponed the teaser's release originally set for December 27.

  • The teaser will now be released on December 28 at 11:07 AM.
  • The decision comes after Singh's passing on December 26 at the age of 92.
  • The makers expressed condolences in their official statement.
  • Singh served as India’s Prime Minister from 2004 to 2014 and was a key figure in economic reforms.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed to 28th December 11:07 AM. Our thoughts are with the nation during this time of mourning.” — Nadiadwala Grandson

The postponement reflects the filmmakers' respect for Singh's legacy and the sentiments of the nation.
newTitle: Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Postponed Due to Manmohan Singh's Demise

Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection day 22: Allu Arjun’s blockbuster demolishes Rs 1700 crore barrier; Baahubali 2’s record about to topple - The Indian Express
summary:
Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection day 22

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2: The Rule, featuring Allu Arjun, is making waves at the box office, having crossed the Rs 1700 crore milestone worldwide just 22 days after its release, boosted by the holiday season.

  • The film earned Rs 9.6 crore net on day 22, bringing its total domestic collection to Rs 1119.2 crore.
  • It recorded a Telugu occupancy rate of 23.27% across over 500 shows and approximately 19.08% occupancy in Hindi with over 3000 shows.
  • Pushpa 2 is now the highest-grossing Indian film of 2024 and is expected to surpass Baahubali 2’s lifetime global gross.
  • The film's success is attributed to its engaging storyline and strong performances by its cast, including Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil.
  • Newer releases struggled at the box office in comparison, with Baby John and Viduthalai 2 failing to gain traction.
"The success of Pushpa 2: The Rule is a testament to the power of well-made films to draw in audiences and create a lasting impact."

The incredible performance of Pushpa 2 highlights its widespread appeal, and anticipation builds for potential future installments in this franchise.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Breaks Rs 1700 Crore at the Box Office

Telangana CM Revanth Reddy Announces Cabinet Sub-Committee for Telugu Cinema Issues

Date: Dec 27, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Chief Minister Revanth Reddy recently addressed members of the Telugu film industry, outlining significant measures to support its growth and prosperity amidst ongoing controversies.

  • A Cabinet Sub-Committee will be established to address the concerns of the Telugu film industry.
  • Film producer Dil Raju appointed as Chairman of the Film Development Corporation (FDC).
  • Government issued special orders for eight films and provided police grounds for filming Pushpa-2.
  • CM Reddy emphasizes promoting eco-tourism and temple tourism as part of industry support.
  • Criticism arises from BJP leader Amit Malviya regarding the government's alleged targeting of Tollywood.
CM Reddy stated, "A Cabinet Sub-Committee will be constituted to resolve the problems of the Telugu film industry."

The Telangana government's response aims to enhance support for the local film industry and address ongoing challenges, promoting Hyderabad as a competitive hub for film production.

summary:
5 OTT Releases to Watch This Week: Singham Again, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, and Squid Game Season 2

Date: Dec 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

This week offers a mix of exciting OTT releases, including new seasons of popular series and the digital release of hit films. Here's a guide to what’s streaming this week.

  • Squid Game (Season 2) - Netflix: The long-awaited follow-up to the hit series begins streaming on December 26, featuring familiar faces and new deadly games.
  • Singham Again - Prime Video India: Ajay Devgn returns as DCP Bajirao Singham, on a mission to rescue his kidnapped wife, streaming from December 27.
  • Doctors - JioCinema: A medical drama starring Harleen Sethi and Sharad Kelkar, exploring ambition and personal conflicts, streaming on December 27.
  • Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 - Netflix India: This horror comedy, starring Kartik Aaryan, mixes humor with thrills, streaming from December 27.
  • Your Fault - Prime Video: A sequel exploring the challenges faced by a couple against family opposition, based on the Culpables trilogy, streaming from December 27.
“An exciting week for OTT viewers with various genres ranging from horror to medical drama.”

This week features diverse genres for all tastes, giving viewers a lot to choose from as many popular titles return to the screen.
newTitle: 5 OTT Releases to Watch This Week: Singham Again, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, and Squid Game Season 2
